Translations.Text: Ha tara pracina kalacya lokanca dina (dharma) ahe
Ani amhi kadapi siksa- yatana prapta karanaryampaiki asanara nahi

Jya'arthi ‘ada’ janasamuhacya lokanni (hajarata) huda yanna khote tharavile yasathi amhi tyanna nasta kele. Nihsansaya, yata mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahuteka loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
‘Samuda’ samudayacya lokannihi paigambarasa khote tharavile
Jevha tyance bandhu ‘svaleha’ne tyanna sangitale ki kaya tumhi allahace bhaya balagata nahi
Mi tumacyakade allahaca visvasta paigambara ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala magata nahi. Majha mobadala tara sarva visvancya palanakartyakade ahe
Kaya vastum (denagyam) madhye, jya ithe aheta, tumhala santipurvaka sodale ja'ila
Arthata tya bagammadhye ani tya jharyammadhye
Ani tya setammadhye ani tya khajurincya bagammadhye jyance ghosa (bhara vadhalyane) tutuna padatata
Ani tumhi parvatanna koruna akarsaka (sundara) imarati nirmana karata
Yastava allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe anusarana kara
Ani maryadece ullanghana karanaryance anusarana karanyapasuna thamba
Je dharatita phasada (utpata) pasaravita aheta ani sudharana karita nahi
Te mhanale, tu tara asa lokampaiki ahesa, jyancyavara jadutona kela gela ahe
Tu tara amacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe. Jara tu sacca lokampaiki ahesa tara ekhada mojija (isacamatkara) ghe'una ye
(Svaleha) mhanale, hi sandani ahe. Pani pyayaci eka pali hici, ani eka nirdharita divasi pani pinyaci pali tumaci
(Ani khabaradara!) Hila va'ita hetune hata lavu naka, an'yatha eka mothya divasaci siksa- yatana tumhala ye'una dharela
Tarihi tyanni tice hata paya kapuna takale, nantara pascattapa karanare jhale
Tevha azaba (allahacya siksa- yatane) ne tyanna ye'una dharale. Nihsansaya, yata mothi sikavana (bodha) ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhate
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha prabhavasali, dayavana ahe
